languages.text: Deals double the damage of {g|f:a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}Ignite{/g} to all creatures in a 12-cell line and reduces their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −{uip|ArmourReduction|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b} until the end of combat. If the enemy's armour falls to 0, it gains the warp burn effect. Warp Burn: deals {uip|Damage|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b} damage to the target at the end of their turn, with {uip|Penetration|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b}% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}. The target creature must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b} penalty to stop {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}.
languages.original_text: Наносит двойной урон от Воспламенения всем существам на линии длиной 12 клеток и уменьшает их {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броню{/g} на −{uip|ArmourReduction|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b} до конца боя. Если броня противника становится равной 0, он получает эффект варп-горения. Варп-{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горение{/g}: наносит цели {uip|Damage|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b} урона в конце ее хода. {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Пробитие брони{/g} составляет {uip|Penetration|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b}%. Для снятия эффекта цели требуется пройти проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со штрафом −{uip|ResistancePenalty|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b}.

traits.locale_text: Deals double damage of Ignite to all creatures in a 12-cell line and reduces their armour by −10+2×(psy rating)% until the end of combat. If the enemy's armour lowers to 0, it gains the Warp Burn effect. Warp Burn: Deals (Psyker's WP bonus)/2+(psy rating) damage to the target at the end of their turn, with 5×(psy rating)% armour penetration. The target creature must make an Agility test with a −5×(Psyker's psy rating) penalty to stop burning.

Deals double the damage of Ignite to all creatures in a 12-cell line and reduces their armour by −(10 + 2 × psy rating)% until the end of combat. If the enemy's armour falls to 0, it gains the warp burn effect. Warp Burn: deals (psyker's WP bonus / 2 + psy rating) damage to the target at the end of their turn, with (5 × psy rating)% armour penetration. The target creature must pass an Agility test with a −(5 × psyker's psy rating) penalty to stop burning.

Deals double the damage of Ignite to all creatures in a 12-cell line and reduces their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −{uip|ArmourReduction|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b} until the end of combat. If the enemy's armour falls to 0, it gains the warp burn effect. Warp Burn: deals {uip|Damage|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b} damage to the target at the end of their turn, with {uip|Penetration|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b}% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}. The target creature must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b} penalty to stop {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}.

Deals double the damage of Ignite to all creatures in a 12-cell line and reduces their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −{uip|ArmourReduction|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b} until the end of combat. If the enemy's armour falls to 0, it gains the warp burn {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g}. Warp Burn: Deals {uip|Damage|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b} damage to the target at the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, with {uip|Penetration|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b}% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}. The target creature must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to stop {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}.

Deals double the damage of Ignite to all creatures in a 12-cell line and reduces their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −{uip|ArmourReduction|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b} until the end of combat. If the enemy's armour falls to 0, it gains the warp burn effect. Warp Burn: deals {uip|Damage|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b} damage to the target at the end of their turn, with {uip|Penetration|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b}% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}. The target creature must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b} penalty to stop {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}.

Если броня противника становится равной 0, он получает эффект варп-горения. Варп-{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горение{/g}: наносит цели {uip|Damage|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b} урона в конце ее хода. {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Пробитие брони{/g} составляет {uip|Penetration|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b}%. Для снятия эффекта цели требуется пройти проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со штрафом −{uip|ResistancePenalty|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b}.
languages.original_text: Deals double the damage of Ignite to all creatures in a 12-cell line and reduces their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −{uip|ArmourReduction|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b} until the end of combat. If the enemy's armour falls to 0, it gains the warp burn effect. Warp Burn: deals {uip|Damage|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b} damage to the target at the end of their turn, with {uip|Penetration|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b}% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}. The target creature must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b} penalty to stop {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Наносит двойной урон от Воспламенения всем существам на линии длиной 12 клеток и уменьшает их броню на −(10 + 2 × пси-рейтинг)% до конца боя. Если броня противника становится равной 0, он получает эффект варп-горения. Варп-горение: Наносит цели ({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} ВОЛ псайкера / 2 + пси-рейтинг) урона в конце ее {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}. Пробитие брони составляет (5 × пси-рейтинг)%. Для снятия эффекта цели требуется пройти проверку Ловкости со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −(5 × пси-рейтинг псайкера).

Наносит двойной урон от Воспламенения всем существам на линии длиной 12 клеток и уменьшает их броню на −(10 + 2 × пси-рейтинг)% до конца боя. Если броня противника становится равной 0, он получает эффект варп-горения. Варп-горение: Наносит цели ({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} ВОЛ псайкера / 2 + пси-рейтинг) урона в конце ее {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}. Пробитие брони составляет (5 × пси-рейтинг)%. Для снятия эффекта цели требуется пройти проверку Ловкости со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −(5 × пси-рейтинг псайкера).

Наносит двойной урон от Воспламенения всем существам на линии длиной 12 клеток и уменьшает их броню на −{uip|ArmourReduction|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b} до конца боя. Если броня противника становится равной 0, он получает эффект варп-горения. Варп-горение: Наносит цели {uip|Damage|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b} урона в конце ее {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}. Пробитие брони составляет {uip|Penetration|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b}%. Для снятия эффекта цели требуется пройти проверку Ловкости со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −{uip|ResistancePenalty|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b}.

languages.text: 对一条直线上12格的所有生物造成伤害，伤害等同于{g|f:a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}星火燎原{/g}造成{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}伤害{/g}的两倍，并使其护甲降低{uip|ArmourReduction|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b}%，效果持续至战斗结束。如果敌人的护甲降至0%，则对其施加“亚空间烧灼”效果。 亚空间烧灼：目标的回合结束时，受到{uip|Damage|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b}点伤害，此伤害拥有{uip|Penetration|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b}%{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}效果。目标生物需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受-{uip|ResistancePenalty|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b}减值{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}{/g}，只有检定成功才能灭火。
languages.original_text: Deals double the damage of {g|f:a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}Ignite{/g} to all creatures in a 12-cell line and reduces their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −{uip|ArmourReduction|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b} until the end of combat. If the enemy's armour falls to 0, it gains the warp burn effect. Warp Burn: deals {uip|Damage|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b} damage to the target at the end of their turn, with {uip|Penetration|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b}% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}. The target creature must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b} penalty to stop {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 对一条直线12格上的所有生物造成火焰伤害，伤害等同于星火燎原灵能伤害的两倍，并使其{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}降低（10+2×灵能等级）%，效果持续至战斗结束。如果敌人的护甲降至0，则会获得“亚空间烧灼”效果。 亚空间烧灼： 目标的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束时，受到（灵能者的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}/2+灵能等级）点伤害，此伤害附带（5×灵能等级）%{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}效果。此外，目标生物需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，只有检定成功才能灭火。此次检定结果会额外承受（5×灵能等级）点{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。

对一条直线12格上的所有生物造成火焰伤害，伤害等同于星火燎原灵能伤害的两倍，并使其{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}降低{uip|ArmourReduction|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b}，效果持续至战斗结束。如果敌人的护甲降至0，则会获得“亚空间烧灼”效果。 亚空间烧灼： 目标的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束时，受到{uip|Damage|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b}点伤害，此伤害附带{uip|Penetration|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b}%{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}效果。此外，目标生物需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，只有检定成功才能灭火。此次检定结果会额外承受{uip|ResistancePenalty|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b}点{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。

对一条直线上12格的所有生物造成{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，伤害等同于星火燎原造成{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}伤害{/g}的两倍，并使其护甲降低{uip|ArmourReduction|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b}%，效果持续至战斗结束。如果敌人的护甲降至0%，则对其施加“{g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}亚空间{/g}烧灼”效果。 亚空间烧灼：目标的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束时，受到{uip|Damage|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b}点伤害，此伤害拥有{uip|Penetration|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b}%{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}效果。目标生物需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受-{uip|ResistancePenalty|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b}{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}{/g}，只有检定成功才能灭火。

languages.text: Inflige el doble de daño de {g|f:a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}Ignición{/g} a todas las criaturas situadas en una línea recta de 12 casillas y reduce su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} en −{uip|ArmourReduction|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b} hasta el final del combate. Si la armadura del enemigo se reduce a 0, adquiere el efecto quemadura de la disformidad. Quemadura de la disformidad: Inflige {uip|Damage|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b} de daño al objetivo al final de su turno, con un {uip|Penetration|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b} % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g}. La criatura objetivo debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} con una penalización de −{uip|ResistancePenalty|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b} para dejar de {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}arder{/g}.
languages.original_text: Deals double the damage of {g|f:a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}Ignite{/g} to all creatures in a 12-cell line and reduces their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −{uip|ArmourReduction|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b} until the end of combat. If the enemy's armour falls to 0, it gains the warp burn effect. Warp Burn: deals {uip|Damage|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b} damage to the target at the end of their turn, with {uip|Penetration|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b}% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}. The target creature must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b} penalty to stop {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Inflige el doble de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} de Ignición a todas las criaturas situadas en una línea recta de 12 casillas y reduce su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} en −{uip|ArmourReduction|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b} hasta el final del combate. Si la armadura del enemigo se reduce a 0, adquiere el efecto quemadura de la {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}disformidad{/g}. Quemadura de la disformidad: Inflige {uip|Damage|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b} de daño al objetivo al final de su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, con un {uip|Penetration|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b} % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g}. La criatura objetivo debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −{uip|ResistancePenalty|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b} para dejar de {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}arder{/g}.

Inflige el doble de daño de Ignición a todas las criaturas situadas en una línea recta de 12 casillas y reduce su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} en un −{uip|ArmourReduction|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b} hasta el final del combate. Si la armadura del enemigo se reduce a 0, adquiere el efecto quemadura de la disformidad. Quemadura de la disformidad: Inflige {uip|Damage|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b} de daño al objetivo al final de su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, con un {uip|Penetration|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b} % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g}. La criatura objetivo debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −{uip|ResistancePenalty|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b} para dejar de arder.

languages.text: Fügt allen Kreaturen in einer Linie von 12 Feldern den doppelten Schaden von {g|f:a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}Entzünden{/g} zu und verringert ihre {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} bis zum Ende des Kampfes um −{uip|ArmourReduction|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b}. Fällt die Rüstung des Feindes auf 0, erhält er den Effekt Warpbrand. Warpbrand: Fügt dem Ziel am Ende seines Zugs {uip|Damage|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b} Schaden zu, mit {uip|Penetration|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b} % {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g}. Die Zielkreatur muss eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeits{/g} mit einem Abzug von -{uip|ResistancePenalty|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b} bestehen, damit der {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Brand{/g} endet.
languages.original_text: Deals double the damage of {g|f:a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}Ignite{/g} to all creatures in a 12-cell line and reduces their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −{uip|ArmourReduction|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b} until the end of combat. If the enemy's armour falls to 0, it gains the warp burn effect. Warp Burn: deals {uip|Damage|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b} damage to the target at the end of their turn, with {uip|Penetration|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b}% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}. The target creature must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b} penalty to stop {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Fügt allen Kreaturen in einer Linie von 12 Feldern den doppelten {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} von Entzünden zu und verringert ihre {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} bis zum Ende des Kampfes um −{uip|ArmourReduction|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b}. Fällt die Rüstung des Feindes auf 0, erhält er den Effekt {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}Warpbrand{/g}. Warpbrand: Fügt dem Ziel am Ende seines {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} {uip|Damage|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b} Schaden zu, mit {uip|Penetration|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b} % {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g}. Die Zielkreatur muss eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeits{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Probe{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −{uip|ResistancePenalty|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b} bestehen, damit der {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Brand{/g} endet.

Fügt allen Kreaturen in einer Linie von 12 Feldern den doppelten Schaden von Entzünden zu und verringert ihre {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} bis zum Ende des Kampfes um −{uip|ArmourReduction|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b}. Fällt die Rüstung des Gegners auf 0, erhält er den Effekt Warpbrand. Warpbrand: Fügt dem Ziel am Ende seiner {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Runde{/g} {uip|Damage|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b} Schaden zu, mit {uip|Penetration|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b}% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g}. Die Zielkreatur muss eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeits-{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Probe{/g} mit −{uip|ResistancePenalty|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} bestehen, damit der Brand endet.

languages.text: Double les dégâts infligés par {g|f:a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}Enflammer{/g} à toutes les créatures situées sur une ligne longue de 12 cases et réduit leur {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} de −{uip|ArmourReduction|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b} jusqu'à la fin du combat. Si l'armure de l'ennemi tombe à 0, l'effet Combustion du Warp s'applique. Combustion du Warp : inflige {uip|Damage|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b} points de dégâts à la cible à la fin de son tour, avec {uip|Penetration|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b} % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g}. La créature ciblée doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} avec une pénalité de −{uip|ResistancePenalty|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b} pour cesser de se {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}consumer{/g}.
languages.original_text: Deals double the damage of {g|f:a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}Ignite{/g} to all creatures in a 12-cell line and reduces their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −{uip|ArmourReduction|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b} until the end of combat. If the enemy's armour falls to 0, it gains the warp burn effect. Warp Burn: deals {uip|Damage|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b} damage to the target at the end of their turn, with {uip|Penetration|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b}% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}. The target creature must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b} penalty to stop {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Double les dégâts infligés par Enflammer à toutes les créatures situées sur une ligne longue de 12 cases et réduit leur {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} de -(10 + 2 × indice psy) % jusqu'à la fin du combat. Si l'armure de l'ennemi atteint 0, l'effet Combustion Warp s'applique. Combustion Warp : Inflige ({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}VOL{/g} du psyker / 2 + indice psy) points de dégâts à la cible à la fin de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, avec (5 × indice psy) % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g}. La créature ciblée doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}test{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Agilité{/g} avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de -(5 × indice psy du psyker) pour cesser de se consumer.

Double les dégâts infligés par Enflammer à toutes les créatures situées sur une ligne longue de 12 cases et réduit leur {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} de -{uip|ArmourReduction|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b} jusqu'à la fin du combat. Si l'armure de l'ennemi atteint 0, l'effet Combustion Warp s'applique.Inflige {uip|Damage|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b} points de dégâts à la cible à la fin de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, avec {uip|Penetration|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b} % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g}. La créature ciblée doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}test{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Agilité{/g} avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de -{uip|ResistancePenalty|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b} pour cesser de se consumer.

languages.text: 直線12セル以内のすべての生物に発火の倍のダメージを与え、その{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}を戦闘終了まで −{uip|ArmourReduction|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b}減少させる。敵のアーマーが0になった場合、「歪みの炎」効果を受ける。 歪みの炎：ターゲットのターン終了時に、{uip|Damage|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b}分のダメージを与える。このダメージは{uip|Penetration|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b}%分の{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}を持つ。ターゲットの生物は、{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}を止めるには−{uip|ResistancePenalty|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b}のペナルティを受けた状態で、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に成功しなければならない。
languages.original_text: Deals double the damage of Ignite to all creatures in a 12-cell line and reduces their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −{uip|ArmourReduction|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b} until the end of combat. If the enemy's armour falls to 0, it gains the warp burn effect. Warp Burn: deals {uip|Damage|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b} damage to the target at the end of their turn, with {uip|Penetration|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b}% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}. The target creature must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b} penalty to stop {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 直線12セル以内のすべての生物に発火の倍のダメージを与え、その{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}を戦闘終了まで −{uip|ArmourReduction|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b}減少させる。敵のアーマーが0になった場合、「歪みの炎」効果を受ける。 歪みの炎：ターゲットのターン終了時に、{uip|Damage|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b}分のダメージを与える。このダメージは{uip|Penetration|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b}%分の{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}を持つ。ターゲットの生物は、{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}を止めるには−{uip|ResistancePenalty|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b}のペナルティを受けた状態で、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に成功しなければならない。

直線12セル以内のすべての生物に発火の倍のダメージを与え、その{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}を戦闘終了まで −{uip|ArmourReduction|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b}する。敵のアーマーが0になった場合、「ワープの炎」効果を受ける。 ワープの炎： ターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了時に、{uip|Damage|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b}分のダメージを与える。このダメージは{uip|Penetration|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b}%分の{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}を持つ。ターゲットの生物は、炎上を止めるには−{uip|ResistancePenalty|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b}の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を受けた状態で、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に成功しなければならない。

直線12セル以内のすべての生物に発火の倍の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与え、その{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}を戦闘終了まで −{uip|ArmourReduction|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b}する。敵のアーマーが0になった場合、{g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}「ワープの炎」{/g}効果を受ける。 ワープの炎：ターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了時に、{uip|Damage|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b}分のダメージを与える。このダメージは{uip|Penetration|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b}%分の{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}を持つ。ターゲットの生物は、{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}を止めるには−{uip|ResistancePenalty|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b}の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を受けた状態で、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に成功しなければならない。

languages.text: 12 hücrelik bir hatta bulunan tüm yaratıklara {g|f:a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}Tutuştur{/g} kabiliyetinin iki katı hasar verir ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırhlarını{/g} {uip|ArmourReduction|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b} kadar azaltır. Bu etki, çatışma sonuna dek sürer. Düşmanın zırhı 0'a düşerse öte yanığı etkisine maruz kalır. Öte Yanığı: Hedefe turunun sonunda %{uip|Penetration|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b} {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}zırh delme{/g} özelliğine sahip {uip|Damage|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b} hasar verir. Hedef yaratık, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}yanmayı{/g} durdurmak için −{uip|ResistancePenalty|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b} ceza puanına sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidir.

If the enemy's armour falls to 0, it gains the warp burn effect. Warp Burn: deals {uip|Damage|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b} damage to the target at the end of their turn, with {uip|Penetration|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b}% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}. The target creature must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b} penalty to stop {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}.
